title: Google Associate Cloud Engineer
description: Deploying and managing applications and infrastructure on Google Cloud Platform. Skills in Compute Engine, Cloud Storage, IAM, networking and monitoring using GCP tools.

title: ISTQB Certified Tester Advanced Level – Test Automation Engineering (CTAL-TAE) v2.0
description: Designing and implementing software test automation strategies. Proficiency in test framework architectures, tool selection, scripting and CI/CD pipeline integration.

title: Google Cloud Digital Leader
description: Understanding of fundamental cloud concepts and Google Cloud products. Ability to articulate how cloud technologies can support an organization's digital transformation.

title: ISTQB® Foundation Level (CTFL)
description: Software testing fundamentals: test design techniques, test management, static and dynamic testing, test levels and types. Internationally recognized ISTQB certification.

title: Certificat Voltaire
description: Certification attesting to the level of mastery of French spelling and grammar. A professional reference ensuring written communication quality.

title: Responsible Design of Digital Services
description: Eco-design of digital services: reducing environmental footprint, accessibility, digital sobriety and best practices for responsible and sustainable web development.

title: n8n Essentials
description: Workflow automation with n8n: creating integration scenarios, connecting APIs, orchestrating tasks and setting up no-code/low-code automated processes.

title: Learning Docker
description: Application containerization with Docker: building images, managing containers, Docker Compose, volumes and best practices for development and production environments.

title: Learning Jenkins
description: Continuous integration and deployment with Jenkins: configuring CI/CD pipelines, automating builds, managing plugins and orchestrating software delivery workflows.

title: JavaScript Essential Training
description: JavaScript fundamentals: DOM manipulation, event-driven programming, functions, closures, promises and best practices for modern front-end development.
